column2: Italy gives Google 18 months to change data use practices MILAN
column3: July 21 Italy's data protection regulator has given Google 18 months to change the way it treats and stores user data
column4: bringing to an end an investigation that is part of a European drive to reform the internet giant's privacy practices.

column2: China has more people going online with a mobile device than a PC BEIJING
column3: July 21 The number of China's internet users going online with a mobile device - such as a smartphone or tablet - has overtaken those doing so with a personal computer (PC) for the first time
column4: said the official China Internet Network Information Center (CNNIC) on Monday.

column4: a top French civil servant and manager of the French government's holdings in strategic companies

column7: July 21 Netflix Inc said on Monday its quarterly profit more than doubled
column8: boosted by strong growth in U.S. and international subscribers as a price increase for its most popular U.S. video streaming plan did not deter new users. LOS ANGELES

column2: Wal-Mart adds $102.9 mln in Indian wholesale business in June MUMBAI
column3: July 21 Wal-Mart Stores Inc has infused fresh funds worth 6.2 billion rupees ($102.9 million) into its Indian wholesale business in June
column4: according to a filing made by its Indian unit to the Registrar of Companies.
